Janurary 2020

Become a publisher

Get in touch with us to learn how you can start monetizing your assets. From your physical store, to your app and even your website -- we can help!

Work with us!

Lumicc is hiring! We're looking for creative marketing professionals. If you're interested, contact us!

Learn More

Why LUMICC?

Ads you understand.

As life moves online, an older generation faces a digital divide

The average age of a business owner in the U.S. is 50 YO. Uncomfortable with tech, many are struggling to use modern tools to keep their business afloat. We will assign you a dedicated team specialist who will guide you every step of the way.

Expensive

Cost of advertising continues to rise dramatically

Google and YouTubes cost per one 1,000 views (CPM) up by 108%, Facebook ad costs saw a 89% increase, TikTok went up by 92% increase and Snapchat had the lowest 64% increase and they show no signs of slowing down.

Transparency

In 2021, ad fraud cost advertisers $65 billion!

Digitalad fraudis expected to reach $500 billion by2025, which would make it the largest criminal enterprise after thedrug trade. We help you make the most out of your advertising dollars by ensuring your ads are only shown to potential customers, not bots.

Frequently Ask Questions
